findings.rationale: The obligation to maintain confidentiality continues indefinitely, which can lead to unforeseen liabilities and challenges in the future.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: Indemnifying without limit can expose a party to significant financial risk in case of a breach or dispute.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: The exclusion of limitation on liability can result in substantial financial exposure for both parties in the event of a breach.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic assignment of rights to Company A may disadvantage the receiving party, especially if contributions are significant.
findings.evidence_quote: The receiving party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product.

findings.rationale: The clause makes the losing party responsible for all attorney fees, which can lead to higher costs in disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
